title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1241/97 of 30 June 1997 extending Regulation (EC) No 1200/95 laying down certain transitional arrangements to determine the agricultural component for imports of the goods listed in Table 1 of Annex B to Council Regulation (EC) No 3448/93 in order to implement the obligations deriving from the Agricultural Agreement concluded during the Uruguay Round of multilateral trade negotiations
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1241/97 of 30 June 1997 extending Regulation (EC) No 1200/95 laying down certain transitional arrangements to determine the agricultural component for imports of the goods listed in Table 1 of Annex B to Council Regulation (EC) No 3448/93 in order to implement the obligations deriving from the Agricultural Agreement concluded during the Uruguay Round of multilateral trade negotiations
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1200/95, '30 June 1997` is replaced by '30 June 1998`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1997.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(2) OJ No L 169, 27. 6. 1997, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 318, 20. 12. 1993, p. 18.
(4) OJ No C 105, 11. 4. 1996, p. 8.
(5) OJ No L 119, 30. 5. 1995, p. 8.
(6) OJ No L 161, 29. 6. 1996, p. 109.
